name: My Galaxy Shooter 2D
description:
In Galaxy Shooter 2D, a player moves across space to fire lasers at descending invaders.

Tap the Space key to fire lasers. Use WASD or arrow keys to move player around.

Grab random Power-ups to increase speed, launch triple lasers, and create a shield to deflect attacks.

You have three lives. Three hits by the invaders and it's bye...bye...

Only one level for now...
